label.value: Lookup tables are generated by a process in the SEcloud. These files are send down to the devices to enrich data for prioritisation, these are used to prioritise reports on the data from certain devices.
Send Commands out to All Devices
Sensor Data proxy and Pass to DMZ cloud

property.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute
